description: Numbers n such that n^2+1 is squarefree.
comments: A059592(n) = 1; cf. A069987. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 08 2006Complement of A049532.
prog: (MAGMA) [ n: n in [1..100] | IsSquarefree(n^2+1) ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 25 2010(PARI) isok(n) = issquarefree(n^2+1); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 09 2016
author: _Labos Elemer_
